title: Beef stuffed mushrooms
ingredients: ['450g lean beef mince', '900g fresh mushrooms - stems removed, chopped and reserved', '60g butter', '75g chopped green peppers', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '3 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves, crushed', '100g breadcrumbs', '225g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
